description: This is as easy at it sounds — almost effortless, really Just be sure to use a vermouth you really love (I’m a fan of dark, robust, earthy Spanish ones) and keep the bottle in the fridge.
title: Vermouth Spritz Recipe
text:
This is as easy at it sounds — almost effortless, really. Just be sure to use a vermouth you really love (I’m a fan of dark, robust, earthy Spanish ones) and keep the bottle in the fridge.
Featured in: Cocktails The Lazy Way, At The End Of The Day.
